Greetings from ZionVPS - http://zionvps.com


Today we are here to offer openvz servers. The nodes are located in Montreal, Canada. Node specs are AMD Operaton CPU, 32 or 64 GB ram, 4x2tb hard disks raided 0+1, bandwidth upgraded to 1.5Gbps. Offer:


* $6.50 /Mo 
* 30 GB Raid protected SAS HDD
* 512 mb ram
* unmetered bandwidth
* 1 IPv4, 2 IPv6 with DDoS protection
* Access to 2 cpu cores
* [buy now](https://billing.zionvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=2)

Note:You may not use unmetered bandwidth for denial - of service attacks. Hosting legal mirrors are allowed, for example - a debian http mirror. To prevent abuse, unmetered bandwidth is limited with port speed. This offer comes with 50Mbps

Payment is accepted via Paypal and bitcoins and after payment, provisioning is instant.
